name: Forerunners Ymir
description:
This is a small content demo of a product i've been working on. I'm hopping to be able to get all the levels and areas and extra content done asap.

Forerunners Ymir is a point and click horror game set in a distant frigid planet, with no information as to whats going on, you're going to have to figure out things as you go to understand just what happened long ago.

Bit of a warning, this game is very much in an alpha state and will contain a lot of bugs, the sound effects are loud and going from scene to scene can be buggy, i've done my best to present you with the cleanest game i possibly give for this month of spooks.

Given the early state of the game and aspects i might have missed, you can join my discord server to give any information on bugs you might have found or things i could possibly fix to make this demo play even better and effect the game overall.
https://discord.gg/sEj5gjY

Controls and Gameplay

A and D to move the camera while exploring.
Click to interact with objects around the map.

Gameplay tips
There is only one save slot for now, i'm working on the save menu for multiple selections.
When you're being attacked you need to click on the yellow areas before time runs out to bunt the attacks, doing so will build up a chance to attack the enemy, which will show up as a red dot.
Don't click recklessly while in combat, you have a limited set of ammo per encounter and your weapon operates with clips, reload while at 5 bullets and you'll lose those 5 bullets.

Certain aspects of the game are not finished.
